function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Government not effectively communicating risk","Impact":"Misinformation and lack of preparedness","Mitigation":"Improved communication channels and collaboration with other actors","Technologies":"Risk communication platforms and tools","People":"Government, public, other actors","Owner":"Government, other actors"},{"Description":"Uncertain and unexpected outcomes","Impact":"Challenges and lack of preparedness","Mitigation":"Scenario planning and collaboration with other actors","Technologies":"Scenario planning tools, risk assessment tools","People":"Government, public, other actors","Owner":"Government, other actors"}]}
